speaker: Varsha Parthasarathy
title: Revolutionizing Image Search with Vectors
description:
Discover the game-changing potential of Azure Cognitive Search's Vector search feature (preview), which enables precise and efficient image retrieval by capturing semantic similarities between images. Delve into advanced image search functionalities like content-based image similarity, visual recommendations, and image clustering. Witness the transformative impact of pairing Azure Cognitive Search with Azure AI Vision, as we elevate image search applications and the user experience navigating visual content.

00:16 On Today's Show
